items.heading: Education
items.description:
• Masters in Information Technology, University of New South WalesJuly 2017 to September 2019
  • B.E. (First Class with Distinction) in Electronics and Communication Engineering September 2011 to May 2015

items.heading: Work Experience
items.description:
• SapientNitro, Gurgaon, IndiaJune 2015 to June 2017
    Demonstrated the knowledge in Front End technologies by implementing and enhancing a custom framework based on BackboneJS that enabled other projects.

items.heading: Academic Projects
items.description:
• Course Recommender SystemMay 2019 to July 2019
    Designed and developed the Front End and the Back End APIs for a Course Recommender System using real data from UNSW.
  • Quotes GeneratorDecember 2018 to January 2019
    Created a web app that calls APIs to generate downloadable backgrounds that feature quotes.

items.heading: Skills
items.description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, ReactJS, Responsive Design, Adobe Photoshop, Sass, jQuery, Bootstrap, Git, D3, Python

items.heading: Extra-Cirricular & Hobbies
items.description:
• Organized a Paper Drive to collect newspapers to raise awareness about recycling in areas surrounding the college in association with the Rotary Club of RV College of Engineering.
  • Organized an event in the College Festival (8th Mile) in 2014.
  • Volunteered at several social events in the college.
  • Oil Painting, Watercolor Painting. Reading Books. Playing Chess.
